page.title: 08The Sinclair C5 electric car
page.content: It was driven by a battery and could go 20 miles before the battery needed charging.It had a coloured dial which showed you how much electricity was left in the battery.It also had pedals so you could still move if the battery was flat. I had my photograph taken sitting in the car.Then it was my turn to drive it.I was really excited and a little nervous.I was told how to start and stop it.Then off I went ,it felt a bit strange the first time around the hall and I went slowly.But the second and third time was great. My father was disappointed with it and thought it would never sell.He said it was not safe for the roads. But I thought it was great and asked my dad could I have one for my birthday.He said no fear! not at Â£399. I think I'll ask my mother.
